name: LookForDanger
description:
Game plot
This work is the beginning of the story. what happened on the mainland,
The young hero is forced to embark on an adventure accompanied by a maiden magician,
Or some mysterious creature...they will have different problems and your choices will change them

Game Features
Confused maze map, users need to pay attention to recognize each section of the road
Explore four major maps, 15 minimaps, and a variety of puzzles

Solve the puzzles and make friends, match all kinds of partners, but you must have wisdom

The story is not a single ending, your different choices will affect the subsequent stories

Your different choices also affect your team

How to solve puzzles, make friends and enrich your team is the charm of this story

The puzzles are not difficult, the difficulty is up to you
-------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------- -


This is my personal work, because the budget is limited, so there is still a lot of room for improvement
Although the game does not have gorgeous battles, I hope the story can attract everyone to explore
Next is the underworld, and the story has a preliminary idea.
Hope you all support the purchase
After all, the pictures and characters need to be redesigned, and the story of the underworld needs a better performance
thank you all
thanks

fits any model
